alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cook County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1101 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gunflint Lake, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Cook County, including the following locations... Bearskin Lake, Poplar Lake, Daniels Lake, Two Island Lake, North Lake and Clearwater Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore
